- No broker fee

Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. Gorgeous amenities, a real must see.

Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available now Small pets welcome

Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location! Nice renovation!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your small furry friends ? the building allows pets!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Domino Park, Williamsburg Bridge, etc nearby.
9/1 move in Small pets welcome

Everything you?ve been looking for in Bushwick is right here! This 2nr floor, two bedroom in a fun neighborhood has original wood molding details and plenty of windows to allow the natural light to flow in. Massive living room with a window bringing in natural light. Cross the street and sip your morning coffee at Maria Hernandez park. Enjoy the multitude of neighborhood cafes and bars. No need to worry about commute times, the Jefferson L train stop is just two blocks from your door. All this and pet-friendly too!
No fee pets ok Call or text to set up a viewing

?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact us now to set up a viewing!

Rent stabilized beauty built inside of what use to be a church from the 1880s. Building has been renovated into luxury apartments but kept many of the architectural original details. This is a large 1br
PLEASE READ very important details on qualifications. To qualify you must make more than $74,784 and less than $121,420. If for 2 people then no more than $138,840.
You must have excellent credit history and be able to clearly prove your yearly income. If you qualify, please reach out to me via email or text to set up immediate viewing
Unit features: Original details from original church building. Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Spacious living room. Bedroom is small but has charm.
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room on each floor Garbage shoot and recycling rooms on each floor Huge Roof deck with elevator to the roof Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO FEE Just 1st and security to move in Pets ok
Call or text to see right away!!

details.description:
Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won't be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.

BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

details.description:
Introducing a brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views spanning both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Immerse yourself in the abundance of nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more. Delight in the long-established, delectable local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee, while still satisfying those late-night cravings at spots we all secretly adore (*cough Shake Shack), just a few blocks away. Experience the perfect blend of old-school Brooklyn charm and modern luxury living, and prepare to fall in love with your new home here.
Convenience is key, as the building is conveniently located near the A, C, and F trains, as well as the B57, B62, and B69 bus routes.
Unit Features: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen with Dishwasher & Microwave Central A/C & Heat Private Balconies available upon inquiry In-unit laundry available upon inquiry
Building Features: Rooftop Deck Laundry Room Fitness Center Recreation Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed First & Security deposit required No broker fee!
Come and experience the epitome of luxury living in this exceptional new building. Don't miss out on this opportunity to make it your new home.

details.description:
Welcome to 2 Stanwix in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.

details.description:
The comfort of home doesn't end at your front door in this neighborhood! The moment you step outside your door (of your beautiful new home!) you will see dive bars next to cocktail bars next to sports bars. You'll see taco trucks next to fine dining next to tried and true neighborhood classic restaurants. You'll see coffee shops next to record stores next to organic markets. Anything and everything you could want can be found in this beautifully diverse area. Whoever you are, you will feel like you belong :)Conveniently located off the L, M, and J trains as well as the B38, B54, B57 and B60 bus routes.

3br/1bth! Quiet convenience is the name of the game! Just a couple blocks off Myrtle-Wyckoff means restaurants, bars, coffee, FULL SIZE grocers (a borderline luxury in NYC), bodegas galore, and so much intersecting transportation! The list goes on as to why this neighborhood is one of the best in North Brooklyn. The greatest part of it all is that somehow, even with all that happening just around the corner, you can find a quiet calmness on these side streets. You'll really have it all!
Conveniently located off the L and M trains, as well as the B13, B26, B52, B54, B60, Q55, and Q58 bus lines.

details.description:
Introducing 242 Newkirk, located in Kensington, right off the historical Ocean Parkway. 242 Newkirk is a brand new luxury building offering 44 rental units.
All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.

Ideally located on Newkirk Avenue just off Ocean Parkway, you will have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.
Welcome home.

Come live in style in this one-of-a-kind luxury building, converted from a Catholic school. Located on one of the greenest block in Brooklyn!The building amenities include a doorman, gym / fitness center and sauna, laundry room with a great adjacent lounge, parking garage, bike storage, game room, library, roof deck with stunning panoramic views, TWO additional patios, and a mail/package room.The unit boasts extra high ceilings, huge closets, extraordinarily large windows resulting outstanding natural light. You'll have central heat and air conditioning, a video intercom, and a gorgeous tiled bathroom with deep soak tub.
